item.title: Enabling Ruby on Rails support for a domain in Plesk
item.description: If you have Plesk 8.1 or later, you have support available for Ruby on Rails. Unfortunately, clicking the FastCGI checkbox in Plesk won’t get you all of the support you need (and expect). The folks over at Parallels created a relatively simple process to get Ruby on Rails working properly on your site: Go to your domain that you want to adjust, and click Setup. Make sure the CGI and FastCGI options are enabled.
